Eldritch Invocations: Select 2
Magic Initiate (Wizard): Know 2 W0 spells, cast 1 W1 spell/long rest
Arcane Recovery: Short rest restores 1 spell slot levels 1/dy
Charm Animals And Plants: R30' Use Channel Divinity to charm beasts and plants (Wis neg) for 1 min
Conjuration Savant: Copy conjuration spells into spellbook for half cost
Divine Sense: R60' Know location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 2/long rest
Flexible Casting: Convert Sorcery Points to and from spell slots
Font Of Magic: Use 2 Sorcery Points/long rest
Grasp Of Hadar: Eldritch Blast pulls target 10'
Lay On Hands: Heal 20 HP/long rest, use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Minor Conjuration: R10' Create 3' cu, 10 lb object for 1 hr
Nature's Wrath: R10' Use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain target (DC 11 Dex or Str neg)
Ritual Casting: Cast known spell as ritual
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d6 HP after short rest
Spirit Totem (Bear): R60' Targets in 30' radius gain 7 temporary HP and Adv on Str for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Hawk): R60' Targets in 30' radius gain Adv on Perception and self use Reaction to give Adv on attack for 1 min 1/short rest
Spirit Totem (Unicorn): R60' Allies gain Adv to detect creatures in 30' radius for 1 min, self heal spells restore +2 HP 1/short rest
Turn The Faithless: R30' Use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (DC 11 Wis neg) for 1 min
Wild Shape: Transform into CR 1/4 (land only) creature for 1 hr 2/short rest
